category: Jury Committee Regulations/Article 7 (Duties of Committee Members)
contents: Article 7 (Duties of members) ① The chairperson represents the committee and supervises its work. ② The vice chairperson assists the chairperson, and if the chairperson is unable to perform his/her duties due to unavoidable reasons, the vice chairpersons shall perform the duties in order of seniority. ③ Members form a committee and attend the committee to deliberate on matters related to their duties. Revised 2019. 1. 31.
